Identity & Access Management

Secure identity governance and access control with single sign-on, multi-factor authentication, and privileged access management.

Solution Overview

Verto Wave's Identity & Access Management (IAM) solution provides a secure and seamless experience for your users while protecting your critical assets. In today's distributed and hybrid IT environments, managing user identities and controlling access to resources is more complex than ever. Our IAM solution helps you enforce security policies, streamline user access, and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements. We provide a comprehensive framework to manage the entire identity lifecycle, from onboarding to offboarding, and deliver a frictionless user experience with features like Single Sign-On (SSO) and Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA). With our IAM solution, you can strengthen your security posture, improve operational efficiency, and enable your business to grow securely.

Key Features

Feature

Description

Single Sign-On (SSO)

Provide users with seamless access to all their applications with a single set of credentials, improving user experience and reducing password fatigue.

Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)

Add an extra layer of security to your applications and data with MFA, protecting against unauthorized access even if passwords are compromised.

Identity Governance & Administration (IGA)

Automate the process of managing user identities and access rights, ensuring that users have the right access to the right resources at the right time.

Quantified Benefits

Reduce the Risk of Data Breaches by up to 50%

By implementing strong authentication and access controls, we help you protect your organization from costly data breaches.

Improve User Productivity by 20%

SSO and streamlined access requests help your users get access to the resources they need quickly and easily.

Reduce IT Help Desk Costs by 30%

Self-service password reset and automated user provisioning reduce the burden on your IT help desk.

Achieve and Maintain Compliance

Our solution helps you meet regulatory requirements like GDPR, HIPAA, and SOX, avoiding costly fines and penalties.
